thread.title: Watch: Baby bird versus adult leopard
thread.title_full: Watch: Baby bird versus adult leopard

author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Baby bird versus adult leopard
text:
Watch: Baby bird versus adult leopard Article By: Megan Ellis Fri, 28 Aug 2015 2:23 PM Share Your Email Credit: Kruger Sightings/YouTube 
What happens when a full grown leopard takes on a tiny baby bird? Well you wouldn't really expect this resultâ€¦ 
In proof that sometimes brains beat brawn, a video uploaded by Kruger Sightings shows a small baby bird captured by a leopard. 
The little bird's mother can be heard screeching at the leopard and little hope seems left for the chick. 
However the chick frees itself from the leopard's grasp. The leopard recaptures the bird - but the battle is not over yet. 
The chick does something incredibly smart - when it next dashes away, it heads straight for the water. 
The leopard tries to recapture the bird, but jumps as soon as its paw hits the water. 
The little bird then makes off happily while the leopard looks defeated. 
Watch the adorable and funny video below: Related Articles
